name: Drag Extreme Racing 3d
description:
Burn tires and overtake opponents on a variety of tracks!
For your choice of a different fleet of vehicles!

Win the drag championship!

Compete with the best members of the Street drag, going around the
obstacles developing faster top speed or pushing the enemy off the track.

Skills to level!

Competing with rivals and winning you get experience points. Discover new
powerful cars and tracks. Be the coolest in the Drag Extreme Racing edition!

Drag Extreme Racing - the first game in the serie of exciting races!

Enjoy a new world of racing!
